mapper.select: select t3.* from (select ifnull(t1.is_deleted,0) as is_deleted,t1.type,t1.name,t2.apartment_id,t1.id from label_info t1 left join apartment_label t2 on t1.id = t2.label_id and t1.is_deleted = 0 and t2.is_deleted = 0) t3 left join apartment_info t4 on t3.apartment_id = t4.id and t4.is_deleted = 0 where t3.type=1 and t4.id = #{id}
